ygData.subject: Re: Magi Talk
ygData.msgSnippet: Mage can nuke next to Wizards, only at the circle Mages attain their new DD. But the circle after it, almost all other class out-damage a Mage in DD. Level 29
ygData.messageBody:
Mage can nuke next to Wizards, only at the circle Mages attain their new DD.
But the circle after it, almost all other class out-damage a Mage in DD.
Level 29 Cleric spell Wraith or something do 290+ while Mages have to stick
to their level 24 DD, do about 240. Our pets are the best 'trainer' in the
game, ever seen a pet go chasing a green into Unrest estate and end up
pulling Hags and Hands out from it? It happens often, esp. when you lag and
cannot call you pet back in time before it go on his merry chase.
Ya lah, Mages do more damage than Wiz at 34-39 range, but at any other, we
fall far far behind every class liao. EE's spell is a EarthQuake spell that
does about twice the max. damage of the Elemental. No root effect, no snare,
just plain DD on the MOB.
